about_the_game:
"S.E.E.P.: Last Drop" is an adventure puzzle game in the New Weird genre, inspired by SCP Foundation and Lobotomy Corporation.

It offers a one-of-a-kind experience with an extraordinary atmosphere, clever mechanisms, realistic storytelling, and a world that feels entirely grounded in reality.

You'll play as Wei, The Foundation's ace investigator and embark on a thrilling journey through vast and mysterious ruins. As you search for an escape, you'll gather clues, uncover hidden truths, and attempt to reshape your fate.

While exploring, you may encounter the abnormal creatures The Foundation calls E Entities. But don't worry—they are not as invincible as the movies and games make them seem, and you are not defenseless.

Entities vary in form, ability, and nature. It's natural for humans to avoid danger, but only by confronting and comprehending them is it possible to harness them—and ultimately rise above them.

It's normal to feel lost, in pain, and frightened. You have no choice but to move on.

Abide by the protocol.

Do not give up.

Do not s#%^&d@0e 

※ This game is not recommended for children or those with a low tolerance for psychological stress or trauma.

content_descriptors.notes: ※ This game contains cartoon violence, mild abuse and self-harm, and is not recommended for children or those with a low tolerance for psychological stress or trauma.

name: S.E.E.P.: Last Drop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: No one imagined this once seemingly foolish and fragile little girl would become The Foundation's ace investigator. Encounter supernatural entities, learn their ways, harness their power, and restore peace. Even you will wonder: These stories, the kind you only seen on TV—are they really... mine?
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Korean
